defs: an effective picturisation or portraying of a role or roles in a play or novel.
= ಪಾತ್ರನಿರ್ಮಾಣ.
a bringing up of a role or roles of a novel or drama admirably or effectively.
to have or take a part in some activity, enterprise, etc.; to participate.
to perform in a play, movie, etc.; to play a role.
to play rhythmically to the music; to dance.
the passage of a river, stream, etc.
a female dancer.
the condition of different roles being interlinked with, mutually dependant on, each other, to enhance the complexity and depth of the plot as in a play or novel.
= ಪಾತ್ರನಿರ್ಮಾಣ.
= ಪಾತ್ರಾಭಿಗಾರ.
a sprinkling of clarified butter on cooking vessels, dining plates or platters before serving meals, as an act of religious purification.
a man who acts in plays, movies, etc.; an actor.
(dial.) a man who propitiates, as a profession, the deamon gods and who often is possessed by such deamons.
to make (a person) eligible for.
fit or proper to be chosen; worthy of choice.
a man who is worthy of choice or he who has the eligibility for.
any kitchen vessel.
the passage of a stream or river.

ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗ pātre paḍaga (dupl. words.) collectively kitchen vessels; ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಳಿಗೆ pātre paḷige = ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗ; ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಗಡ pātre pagaḍa = ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗ; ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗು pātre paḍagu = ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗ; ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡದೆ pātre paḍade = ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗ;ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪರಟಿ pātre paraṭi = ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗ; ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪರಾಟು pātre parāṭu = ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗ; ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪರಡಿ pātre paraḍi = ಪಾತ್ರೆ ಪಡಗ.
(rightly ಬಾದಶಹ) a muslim king or emperor; a sultan.
